"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Socio-economic Development: The scheme may aim to uplift the socio-economic conditions of the border areas by implementing various development projects. ", "answer": "The primary objectives of the ISBADP are to promote balanced regional development, reduce disparities, enhance infrastructure, improve social services, create livelihood opportunities, and conserve the environment in the border areas.
